h1301.definition: the same as {{h1300}}; Barak, an Israelite; Barak.

h1302.definition: of uncertain derivation; Barkos, one of the Nethimim; Barkos.

h1303.definition: from {{h1300}}; a thorn (perhaps as burning brightly); brier.

h1304.definition: or בָּרְקַתxlit bârᵉkath corrected to bârᵉqath; from {{h1300}}; a gem (as flashing), perhaps the emerald; carbuncle.

h1305.definition: a primitive root; to clarify (i.e. brighten), examine, select; make bright, choice, chosen, cleanse (be clean), clearly, polished, (shew self) pure(-ify), purge (out).

h1306.definition: probably from {{h7562}} with a prepositional prefix; with wickedness; Birsha, a king of Gomorrah; Birsha.

h1307.definition: patrial from {{h1268}}; a Berothite, or inhabitant of Berothai; Berothite.

h1308.definition: from {{h1319}}; cheerful; Besor, a stream of Palestine; Besor.

h1309.definition: or (shortened) בְּשֹׂרָה; feminine from {{h1319}}; glad tidings; by implication, reward for good news; reward for tidings.

h1310.definition: a primitive root; properly, to boil up; hence, to be done in cooking; figuratively to ripen; bake, boil, bring forth, roast, seethe, sod (be sodden).

h1312.definition: of foreign derivation; Bishlam, a Persian; Bishlam.

h1313.definition: from an unused root meaning to be fragrant; (compare {{h5561}}); the balsam plant; spice.

h1314.definition: or בֹּשֶׂם; from the same as {{h1313}}; fragrance; by implication, spicery; also the balsam plant; smell, spice, sweet (odour).

h1315.definition: feminine of {{h1314}} (the second form); fragrance; Bosmath, the name of a wife of Esau, and of a daughter of Solomon; Bashemath, Basmath.

h1316.definition: of uncertain derivation; Bashan (often with the article), a region East of the Jordan; Bashan.

h1318.definition: a primitive root; to trample down; tread.

h1319.definition: a primitive root; properly, to be fresh, i.e. full (rosy, figuratively cheerful); to announce (glad news); messenger, preach, publish, shew forth, (bear, bring, carry, preach, good, tell good) tidings.

h1320.definition: from {{h1319}}; flesh (from its freshness); by extension, body, person; also (by euphemistically) the pudenda of a man; body, (fat, lean) flesh(-ed), kin, (man-) kind,   nakedness, self, skin.

h1322.definition: from {{h954}}; shame (the feeling and the condition, as well as its cause); by implication (specifically) an idol; ashamed, confusion,   greatly, (put to) shame(-ful thing).

h1323.definition: from {{h1129}} (as feminine of {{h1121}}); a daughter (used in the same wide sense as other terms of relationship, literally and figuratively); apple (of the eye), branch, company, daughter, × first, × old,   owl, town, village.

h1324.definition: probably from the same as {{h1327}}; a bath or Hebrew measure (as a means of division) of liquids; bath.

h1326.definition: probably an orthographical variation for {{h1327}}; desolation; waste.

h1327.definition: feminine from an unused root (meaning to break in pieces); desolation; desolate.

h1328.definition: apparently from the same as {{h1326}} and {{h410}}; destroyed of God; Bethuel, the name of a nephew of Abraham, and of a place in Palestine; Bethuel. Compare {{h1329}}.

h1329.definition: for {{h1328}}; Bethul (i.e. Bethuel), a place in Palestine; Bethuel.

h1330.definition: feminine passive participle of an unused root meaning to separate; a virgin (from her privacy); sometimes (by continuation) a bride; also (figuratively) a city or state; maid, virgin.

h1331.definition: masculine plural of the same as {{h1330}}; (collectively and abstractly) virginity; by implication and concretely, the tokens of it; × maid, virginity.

h1332.definition: from {{h1323}} and {{h3050}}; daughter (i.e. worshipper) of Jah; Bithjah, an Egyptian woman; Bithiah.

h1333.definition: a primitive root; to cut in pieces; thrust through.

h1334.definition: a primitive root,; to chop up; divide.

h1336.definition: the same as {{h1335}}; Bether, a (craggy) place in Palestine; Bether.

h1337.definition: from {{h1323}} and a masculine plural from {{h7227}}; the daughter (i.e. city) of Rabbah; Bath-rabbim.

h1338.definition: from {{h1334}}; (with the article) the craggy spot; Bithron, a place East of the Jordan; Bithron.

h1339.definition: from {{h1323}} and {{h7651}} (in the sense of {{h7650}}); daughter of an oath; Bath-Sheba, the mother of Solomon; Bath-sheba.

h1340.definition: from {{h1323}} and {{h7771}}; daughter of wealth;	the same as {{h1339}}; Bath-shua,; Bath-shua.

h1342.definition: a primitive root; to mount up; hence, in general, to rise, (figuratively) be majestic; gloriously, grow up, increase, be risen, triumph.

h1345.definition: from {{h1342}} and {{h410}}; majesty of God; Geuel, an Israelite; Geuel.

h1346.definition: from {{h1342}}; arrogance or majesty; by implication, (concretely) ornament; excellency, haughtiness, highness, pride, proudly, swelling.

h1347.definition: from {{h1342}}; the same as {{h1346}}; arrogancy, excellency(-lent), majesty, pomp, pride, proud, swelling.

h1348.definition: from {{h1342}}; the same as {{h1346}}; excellent things, lifting up, majesty, pride, proudly, raging.

h1350.definition: a primitive root,; to redeem (according to the Oriental law of kinship), i.e. to be the next of kin (and as such to buy back a relative's property, marry his widow, etc.); × in any wise, × at all, avenger, deliver, (do, perform the part of near, next) kinsfolk(-man), purchase, ransom, redeem(-er), revenger.

h1351.definition: a primitive root, (rather identified with {{h1350}}, through the idea of freeing, i.e. repudiating); to soil or (figuratively) desecrate; defile, pollute, stain.

h1353.definition: feminine passive participle of {{h1350}}; redemption (including the right and the object); by implication, relationship; kindred, redeem, redemption, right.

h1354.definition: from an unused root meaning to hollow or curve; (compare {{h1460}} and {{h1479}}); the back (as rounded); by analogy, the top or rim, a boss, a vault, arch of eye, bulwarks, etc.; back, body, boss, eminent (higher) place, (eye) brows, nave, ring.

h1356.definition: from {{h1461}}; a log (as cut out); also well or cistern (as dug); beam, ditch, pit.

h1357.definition: probably from {{h1461}} (compare {{h1462}}); a locust (from its cutting); locust.

h1358.definition: (Aramaic) from a root corresponding to {{h1461}}; a pit (for wild animals) (as cut out); den.

h1359.definition: or (fully) גּוֹב; from {{h1461}}; pit; Gob, a place in Palestine; Gob.

h1360.definition: from an unused root meaning probably to collect; a reservoir; by analogy, a marsh; marish, pit.

h1361.definition: a primitive root; to soar, i.e. be lofty; figuratively, to be haughty; exalt, be haughty, be (make) high(-er), lift up, mount up, be proud, raise up great height, upward.

h1362.definition: from {{h1361}}; lofty (literally or figuratively); high, proud.

h1363.definition: from {{h1361}}; elation, grandeur, arrogance; excellency, haughty, height, high, loftiness, pride.

h1364.definition: or גָּבוֹהַּ; (fully) from {{h1361}}; elevated (or elated), powerful, arrogant; haughty, height, high(-er), lofty, proud, × exceeding proudly.

h1366.definition: or גְּבֻל; (shortened) from {{h1379}}; properly, a cord (as twisted), i.e. (by implication) a boundary; by extension the territory inclosed; border, bound, coast, × great, landmark, limit, quarter, space.

h1367.definition: or גְּבֻלָה; (shortened) feminine of {{h1366}}; a boundary, region; border, bound, coast, landmark. place.

h1368.definition: or גִּבֹּר; (shortened) intensive from the same as {{h1397}}; powerful; by implication, warrior, tyrant; champion, chief, × excel, giant, man, mighty (man, one), strong (man), valiant man.

h1369.definition: feminine passive participle from the same as {{h1368}}; force (literally or figuratively); by implication, valor, victory; force, mastery, might, mighty (act, power), power, strength.

h1371.definition: from an unused root meaning to be high (in the forehead); bald in the forehead; forehead bald.

h1372.definition: from the same as {{h1371}}; baldness in the forehead; by analogy, a bare spot on the right side of cloth; bald forehead, × without.

h1373.definition: from the same as {{h1354}}; collective; Gabbai, an Israelite; Gabbai.

h1374.definition: plural of {{h1356}}; cisterns; Gebim, a place in Palestine; Gebim.

h1375.definition: from an unused root (meaning to be convex); a goblet; by analogy, the calyx of a flower; house, cup, pot.

h1378.definition: from an unused root (probably meaning to freeze); crystal (from its resemblance to ice); pearl.

h1379.definition: a primitive root; also as a denominative from {{h1366}}; properly, to twist as a rope; to bound (as by a line); be border, set (bounds about).

h1380.definition: from {{h1379}} (in the sense of a chain of hills); a mountain; Gebal, a place in Phoenicia; Gebal.

h1381.definition: the same as {{h1380}}; Gebal, a region in Idumaea; Gebal.

h1382.definition: ; patrial from {{h1380}}; a Gebalite, or inhabitant of Gebal; Giblites, stone-squarer.

h1383.definition: from {{h1379}}; a twisted chain or lace; end.

h1384.definition: from an unused root meaning to be arched or contracted; hunch-backed; crookbackt.

h1385.definition: feminine from the same as {{h1384}}; curdled milk; cheese.

h1386.definition: from the same as {{h1384}}; a hump or peak of hills; high.

h1387.definition: from the same as {{h1375}}, a hillock; Geba, a place in Palestine; Gaba, Geba, Gibeah.

h1388.definition: by permutation for {{h1389}}; a hill; Giba, a place in Palestine; Gibeah.

h1389.definition: feminine from the same as {{h1387}}; a hillock; hill, little hill.

h1390.definition: the same as {{h1389}}; Gibah; the name of three places in Palestine; Gibeah, the hill.

h1391.definition: from the same as {{h1387}}; hilly; Gibon, a place in Palestine; Gibeon.

h1392.definition: prolonged from {{h1375}}; the calyx of a flower; bolled.

h1393.definition: patrial from {{h1391}}; a Gibonite, or inhabitant of Gibon; Gibeonite.

h1394.definition: from the same as {{h1375}}; hilliness; Gibath; Gibeath.

h1395.definition: patrial from {{h1390}}; a Gibathite, or inhabitant of Gibath; Gibeathite.

h1396.definition: a primitive root; to be strong; by implication, to prevail, act insolently; exceed, confirm, be great, be mighty, prevail, put to more (strength), strengthen, be stronger, be valiant.

h1397.definition: from {{h1396}}; properly, a valiant man or warrior; generally, a person simply; every one, man, × mighty.

h1398.definition: the same as {{h1397}}; Geber, the name of two Israelites; Geber.

h1399.definition: from {{h1396}}; the same as {{h1397}}; a person; man.
